context: 'Tuote' is a Finnish noun that means 'product' in English. It refers to an item or thing that has been manufactured, produced, or created for sale or use. In Finnish grammar, 'tuote' follows the standard noun declension patterns and can appear in various cases depending on its function in a sentence. When used in the nominative case (as shown in the examples), it typically refers to the product itself without any additional grammatical modifications.
